comment.author: 92448850@N02
comment._content: My grandmother (Elizabeth Brown) was in France during WWI helping build huts - I always thought it was for prisoners of war but they may not have been for this purpose.  She had a scroll showing that she had helped in the construction, unfortunately this was destroyed when she died.  I have wooden hand mirror carved with her name on it dated 1918.  If anyone has any more details I would appreciate hearing from you.  E-mail address peterking131@btinternet.com
